          <title>
            <string language="en">Components of air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestandteile der Luft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Composants d'air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Componentes do ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Componenti di aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συστατικά του αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Componentes del aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This pie chart shows the distribution of oxygen, nitrogen and other gases in air.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">argon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Kreisdiagramm zeigt die Verteilung des 
Sauerstoffes, des Stickstoffes und anderer Gase in einer Luft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme circulaire circulaire montre la 
distribution de l'oxygène, de l'azote et d'autres gaz en air.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta carta de torta mostra a distribuição do 
oxigênio, do nitrogênio e dos outros gáses no ar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma a torta mostra la distribuzione 
di ossigeno, di azoto e di altri gas in aria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα πιτών εμφανίζει τη διανομή του 
οξυγόνου, του αζώτου και άλλων αερίων στον αέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta carta de empanada muestra la distribución 
del oxígeno, del nitrógeno y de otros gases en aire.</string>
          </description>

          <keyword>
